short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a new swim tip to help improve your swimming.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the world of swimming with the Daily Swim Tips extension! Whether you're a beginner looking to improve your technique or an experienced swimmer seeking to refine your skills, this extension provides a comprehensive collection of 100s of swim tips to help you enhance your performance in the water.

From freestyle breathing techniques to backstroke form, from mastering the breaststroke kick to perfecting your flip turns, each tip offers valuable insights and practical advice to elevate your swimming abilities. Discover how to optimize your body position, streamline your strokes, and increase your efficiency with expert guidance tailored to various aspects of swimming.

With tips covering a wide range of topics including breathing, body positioning, stroke mechanics, drills, and training strategies, this extension is a must-have resource for swimmers of all levels. Whether you're training for competition or simply aiming to enjoy a smoother, more effective swim, the Swim Tips extension is your go-to source for unlocking the secrets to swimming success.

Hint: just open up the extension before your swim workout and get an idea of what to work on during your swim session.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if there is some specific swimming advice you are after. We are here to help you swim better.
